comment_data.body: i have the same problem :(
Sorry I didn't know how do it ;)

The problem of my last code is when you send a message and if you have event for onGetMessage, because you will get message with event as new, and the infinite while will return as notify... 

For resolve this you will need order your code :)
It is a credit to Max is not mine :)
@CodersBrothers you what? Can you rephrase that?

My last message? I think that will be cool a event for notify message, to get each pending inbound message, or the same event for new messaget, the onGetMessage event, but with a "notify" type or something like that.

onMessage already parses the notify node and includes the sender's name
https://github.com/venomous0x/WhatsAPI/blob/master/src/php/whatsprot.class.php#L1837

:O @shirioko are you sure that if my bot is offline (the script php not its running), when i start the bot and pollMessages getting the notify messages this event catch each message???  
```php
function onGetMessage(
        $phone, // The user phone number including the country code.
        $from, // The sender JID.
        $msgid, // The message id.
        $type, // The message type.
        $time, // The unix time when send message notification.
        $name, // The sender name.
        $message // The message.
    );
```
yes
LOOOL, i saw the event but i forgot that php not its like javascript and nodejs, that you need bind before connect and login, not after. NOW WORKS! muahahaaha
To be more specific: you need to bind it before you receive the first message, which is after successful login.
I confused Im out home and I could't test it. My last conde was wrong?

title: Get Name
